title: Best of The Program | 8/17/20
description:
Glenn’s back in the studio for the first time since March! Democrats and the media insist that Trump is trying to undermine the Postal Service to cheat the election, but even Obama wasn’t a fan of the USPS. Nancy Pelosi called the House back early to address the controversy, and even Taylor Swift is pushing conspiracy theories. New Zealand’s elections have been delayed by a month due to COVID-19. Glenn will be inducted into the Radio Hall of Fame! New York City may not return to normal after the lockdowns and riots.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
